2.name: Mimmie
2.text: So you're also after the secret treasure in the basement, aren't you?

3.name: Mimmie
3.text: I'm talking about the lifetime supply of Orange Juice.

4.name: Mimmie
4.text: Unfortunately, the basement is locked right now.

5.name: Mimmie
5.text: I tried asking mom where the key is, but she won't tell me.

6.name: Mimmie
6.text: Maybe she'll listen to you, though. Try asking her.

7.name: Mimmie
7.text: If you manage to unlock the basement, I'll find all of the Orange Juice for you.
